author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text:
Good Monday Afternoon Honey's!!!
Saw the doctor today. Looks like I do have to get some more radiation. They want to make sure there are some spots in a few areas they want to get. I can do this!!!. https://t.co/HbGZy99GG8

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text:
Happy Sunday Funday Honey's!!!!
I'm still a lil on the wobbly side since coming home. Did go out to grab a few things, but shouldn't have. (I'm stubborn) 😂
Did notice in my car mirror though, that my hair is starting to grow back. Made me so happy!!!🤓❤

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
Miss Marie ❤🌻
text:
Happy Friday Morning Honey's!!! 
Only 1 more treatment left for me to do today!!! So excited!! Ready to go sleep in my own bed.
Hope y'all have a great day!!! ILY'all!!!!

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text:
Good Hump Day Honey's!!!
Wanted to let y'all know that I'm doing ok. I'm out of surgery and in my room. Let's get these treatments done. 
Thanks for all the love n prayers n good vibes!!! https://t.co/OneFoWuqCz

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text:
Happy Tuesday night/ Wednesday morning Honey's!!!
I can't sleep. Worried about my surgery. Know it will be better this way, but still doesn't make it any easier. Ready to be done with my treatments and ring that bell.
#cancersucks

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text:
Happy 420 Hump Day Honey's!!!!
Hope y'all have had a great day. Actually been pretty good for me. Finally had the energy to get some chores around the house done. And watching some ghost stories on tv.
If you're in a legal state. . . have a hit for me. 🚬

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text: Made sense to me. Coming close to the finish line w/my cancer treatments. Then I want to go do new things. Have new experiences. New places. Just live for the now. https://t.co/00jjGsauq7

text: Ok. . .I need this lamp!!!! This is cool. 🖤🖤🖤🖤 https://t.co/MxQ5QA7Rvy

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text:
Good Monday Evening Honey's!!! 
Depression is a bad thing to suffer from. But finally had some great distractions last night. When you see such a beautiful smile, you can't help but smile too.
Pic from IG: @adamdegross https://t.co/PQPqx3scPY

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text: This would be a huge hand up for me. Lil over a week from now, I have to go into the hospital for my final cancer treatments. It would help with bills and getting my car fixed. It's be a great blessing. https://t.co/IYH43z2yIt

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text: Been so emotional today!!! Holidays for me aren't the same any more. Miss how it was when I was a kid. Distractions aren't even helping. Also scared about my final treatments. Not looking forward to staying in the hospital for them. Had to get that out. Sorry. #cancersucks

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text:
Sweet words that we all need to do our best to live by. ❤❤❤❤ Agree totally we all need to spread love. Too many of us are going thru rough times. 
Always be a good person!!! ILY!! https://t.co/QHiXIB34jf

ILY'all!!!

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text: Well didn't go as planned. Plan B is I have to be put in the hospital for 3 days and have all my treatments done in those 3 days. Gonna suck, but will be faster.

author: Miss Marie ❤🌻
text:
Happy Hump Day Honey's!!!!
Have to say I'm nervous. Today starts the final part of my treatments. Surgery to put a device in to help guide the internal radiation. It's op surgery, but still freaks me out to be put under. 
I'll update later. Have a great day!!
ILY'ALL
